Release.Change: Fixed a bug that made the ModCompiler chrash when no file path is given when a CompilerError is raised.
Fixed some bugs related to the new logging system.
Changed how the MCT Tools compiler works internally... a bit.
MCT Tools compiler now checks for existing types referenced by JSONs.
Enhanced JSON validation/checking for the MCT compiler. (this will reduce the amount of 'Key not found' errors you see when your mod is loading.)
Fixed mouse intput sometimes not properly blocking when the tAPI window is inactive.
Fixed .json files not always saving to the .tapimod.
Made the hacky core of the MCT public (the methods, that is).
Fixed a tiny bug in the MCT Tools.
The mouse is also blocked when the Terraria window is inactive.
Updated to newer version of PoroCYon.XnaExtensions. All mods that reference the PoroCYon.XnaExtensions must be recompiled.
Modified how the MCT Tools handles invalid Version formatting.
Enabled Edit & Continue in Visual Studio. Use the DEBUG <internal name> <path to assembly> command-line arguments.
